titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding funding for feeding assistance programs, especially those affecting children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition and Horticulture .

bill.summary: 5/17/2012--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be no reduction in funding for feeding assistance programs, especially those affecting children.
